duties_responsibilities.duty: Engage with new members and guide them through the benefits enrollment process.
Customize benefits plans for clients to meet their specific needs and preferences.
Foster relationships with existing and new clients to ensure satisfaction and retention.
Perform administrative duties as needed to support benefits enrollment and management.
Enroll niche market clients into exclusive benefit programs.
Provide excellent customer service and support for employee benefits inquiries.
Ensure accuracy and completeness of all documentation related to benefits administration.
Independently resolve routine and complex benefits issues in a timely and effective manner.
Collaborate effectively with team members to streamline benefits processes and improve customer service.
